text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm Chi a cloud support engineer
here at the AWS office in Cape Town
today I'm going to show you how to Grant
access to AWS course Explorer for an AWS
identity and access management user Who
belongs to a member account in AWS
organizations let's get
started first sign into the AWS
Management console from the
organization's management account
navigate to the AWS billing and cost
Management
console in the navigation pane choose
cost management
preferences on the preferences page
under member account permissions on the
general tab choose linked account access
choose safe preferences to activate cost
explor access for all member accounts in
your organization to log out of your
account choose your username in the
navigation Pane and then choose sign out
from the drop-down
list it's important to note that you
can't Grant access to individual member
accounts all member accounts in your
organization are granted access also
member account owners can view cost
Explorer information for other accounts
in your organization
next I'm going to activate access to the
AWS billing console for the member
account sign in to the AWS Management
console with your root account
credentials in the member account use
the email address and password that you
use to create your AWS account only the
root user can enable IM access to
billing it's best practice to use the
root user only when required such as in
this case on the top navigation pane
choose your username and then choose
account from the drop- down
list scroll down to I am user androll
access to billing information choose
edit select activate IM am
access choose
update now that I've activated I am
access to billing account administrators
can control who can access the accounts
billing information with I am
permissions
policies now I'm going to attach an I am
policy to Grant the IM am user access to
course Explorer sign into the AWS
management conso with your am
administrators user credentials to
create the I am policy on the top
navigation pane enter IM
am navigate to
policies choose create
policy switch to the Json Tab and then
add a policy document like the one shown
here this allows all cost Explorer
actions for the user choose next enter a
name such as cost Explorer access and
then provide an optional
description choose create
policy finally I'm going to attach the
policy to the IM am user choose users
select the user that you want to get
access to on the permissions tab choose
add
permissions choose attach existing
policies directly search for and then
select the C Explorer access
policy choose next and then add
permissions now you know how to Grant
access to AWS course Explorer for an AWS
identity and access management user Who
belongs to a member account in AWS
organizations thanks for watching and
happy cloud computing from all of us
here at AWS
[Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
